cab.content: it* - -S..E CyR E T. G.Ti 3335.153WAR CABINET .SAIONICA COMMAND - INTERCKANCE 0? TROOPS IN SEVERAL AREAS.Note^by the Sec re tary.-With reference to.the -latter part of Minute 6, War Cabinet 279,1 am informed By .the War Office that, General-Milne has instituted a system of interchange of troops in the healthy and unhealthy areas in the Salonica Command, and arrangements have "been made for the exchange at the rate of about 2,000 a month of the really bad Malarial cases;(Sgd.) M. P. A. EAITKEY.2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W. 14th January, 1918.
